statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentResearchReports;
SELECT report_title, author FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_title, publish_date FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, report_title, publish_date FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_title, author, publish_date FROM InvestmentResearchReports ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, author FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE publish_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE content LIKE '%market%' AND author LIKE 'Anne%' ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_title FROM InvestmentResearchReports WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM investment_research_reports;
SELECT report_title, analyst_name, report_date FROM investment_research_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT analyst_name, report_title, report_content FROM investment_research_reports WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, report_title, report_date FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, analyst_name, recommendation FROM analyst_recommendations WHERE recommendation = 'Buy' ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT id, report_title, analyst_name, report_date, report_content FROM investment_research_reports;
SELECT report_title, analyst_name FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT analyst_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM investment_research_reports GROUP BY analyst_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT a.analyst_name, a.recommendation, a.recommendation_date, r.report_title FROM analyst_recommendations a INNER JOIN investment_research_reports r ON a.analyst_name = r.analyst_name;
SELECT analyst_name, MAX(report_date) AS latest_report_date FROM investment_research_reports GROUP BY analyst_name ORDER BY latest_report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_commentary
SELECT analyst_name, commentary_text FROM market_commentary WHERE market_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT ticker_symbol, recommendation_text FROM analyst_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC
SELECT report_title, publish_date FROM investment_research_reports WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM investment_research_reports WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_title, publish_date FROM investment_research_reports WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_title, analyst_name FROM investment_research_reports WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM analyst_recommendations WHERE ticker_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT commentary_text, market_date, analyst_name FROM market_commentary WHERE market_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM investment_research_reports;
SELECT report_title, analyst_name, report_date FROM investment_research_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, analyst_name FROM investment_research_reports WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_title, report_date FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM investment_research_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, analyst_name FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT analyst_name FROM analyst_recommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'Buy';
SELECT * FROM market_commentary WHERE analyst_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM investment_research_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Investment_Research_Reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM Investment_Research_Reports WHERE published_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT analyst_name, recommendation FROM Analyst_Recommendations WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM Market_Commentary WHERE commentary_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY commentary_id;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Research_Reports WHERE report_id = 1 ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT report_title, report_content FROM Investment_Research_Reports WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_title ASC;
SELECT analyst_name, recommendation FROM Analyst_Recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-06-01' AND stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM Market_Commentary WHERE commentary_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY commentary_id ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM User_Accounts WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND password IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id DESC;
